properties.Name: ClaimAdjustment
properties.Description: The adjustment(s) applied to the claim.

Columns.Name: ClaimId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Claim.

Columns.Name: ClaimAdjustmentTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a claim adjustment type.

Columns.Name: Timestamp
Columns.Description: The timestamp associated with the Claim Adjustment.

Columns.Name: AdjustmentNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding a claim adjustment.
